new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2025-10-27 19:00:00) positions.

Based on my analysis of the market, I've identified a potential opportunity to optimize the portfolio. While NVDA has performed well, I believe that Micron Technology (MU) has strong growth potential. I've sold my position in NVDA and invested the proceeds in MU. This strategic move is aimed at maximizing our returns. I will continue to monitor the market and make adjustments as needed.
<FINISH_SIGNAL>
